entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Kirkland Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:08 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kirkland Lake 6:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: -2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: -4.6°C
Wind: W 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:08 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:08 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 5:08 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
